title: Heera Jadau Haaram - An Heirloom of Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (Swarna) with intricate Jadau setting. Featuring high-quality Polki diamonds (Heera) with excellent luster and clarity. Finished with a classic Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases the timeless Jadau technique, a hallmark of Mughal-inspired Indian jewelry. The Polki diamonds are expertly set without wax, allowing their natural beauty to shine. The design incorporates traditional floral motifs (Puvvu) and paisley shapes, creating a visually stunning necklace. The large pendant boasts a statement Polki, adding a regal touch.
colors: Predominantly gold with the natural white brilliance of the Polki diamonds. The antique gold finish enhances the vintage aesthetic.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Ideal for brides (Vadhuvu) seeking a statement piece or anyone desiring a touch of timeless elegance.
description: A true heirloom piece crafted with exceptional skill and attention to detail. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and 22K gold ensures lasting beauty and value. Represents a blend of rich cultural heritage and timeless design. Possesses a regal and sophisticated aesthetic, making it a statement piece for any special occasion. The Hyderabadi polish protects the gold and gives it a lasting shine.
